title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid credentials and receives a valid JWT token with appropriate role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click on the login button
Verify login is successful and JWT token is received
Verify user is redirected to dashboard with role-based UI components

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the system rejects login attempts with invalid credentials and shows the appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click on the login button
Verify login is denied and error message is displayed
Verify no JWT token is issued

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that ADMIN and USER roles have correct permissions restricting or allowing access to features and pages.

steps.description: Log in as USER role
Verify access is denied to admin-only pages such as user management
Log out and log in as ADMIN role
Verify ADMIN has full access including administrative functions

title: Create new client with valid data and document upload
description: Verify user can create a new client with all mandatory data filled and upload supported document types successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to 'Create New Client' form
Fill all required client data fields with valid input
Upload one or multiple valid document files
Submit the form
Verify client is created and listed in client management
Verify documents are successfully uploaded and linked to the client

title: Client form input validation and error handling
description: Verify that client creation and editing forms prevent submission with invalid data and show meaningful validation messages.

steps.description: Navigate to client creation or editing form
Leave required fields empty or input invalid data formats
Attempt to submit the form
Verify form submission is blocked
Verify appropriate validation messages are displayed per invalid input field

title: Search clients with pagination and filters
description: Verify client search functionality returns correct results with filters applied and supports pagination for large datasets.

steps.description: Navigate to client management page
Input search criteria and apply filters
Verify matching clients are displayed
Navigate to next page of results
Verify pagination works correctly and no duplicate or missing clients appear

title: Create salary cession with valid data and status monitoring
description: Verify the ability to create a salary cession, assign to a client, track status changes, and generate related documents.

steps.description: Navigate to create new salary cession page
Fill in valid cession details including client reference and payment terms
Submit the cession creation form
Verify new cession appears in cession list with default status
Update the status of the salary cession through its lifecycle
Verify status updates are reflected correctly in UI
Generate and download cession document
Verify document is generated correctly and matches cession data

title: Payment tracking for salary cessions
description: Verify that payments can be recorded against salary cessions and their statuses and balances update accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to payment management page
Select a salary cession and record a payment
Verify payment is saved and linked to the correct cession
Verify cession payment status and outstanding balances update accordingly

title: Expense and income recording with financial report verification
description: Verify users can record expenses and incomes with valid data and generated financial reports reflect these entries accurately with correct chart visualization.

steps.description: Navigate to expense recording section and log a new expense with valid inputs
Navigate to income recording section and log a new income with valid inputs
Navigate to financial reports page
Verify recorded expenses and incomes appear accurately in reports
Verify charts correctly visualize the financial data

title: Inventory product CRUD operations with stock tracking
description: Verify create, read, update, and delete operations for products and categories work correctly and stock levels are tracked and updated properly.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory management page
Create a new product under a category with valid inputs
Verify product is listed and stock quantity is displayed
Edit product details and update stock quantity
Verify updated product details and stock quantity are saved
Delete a product
Verify product is removed from the list

title: Language switching and RTL layout rendering
description: Verify users can switch application language among Arabic, English, and French and that Arabic renders correctly with RTL layout across all supported platforms.

steps.description: Navigate to application settings
Switch application language to Arabic
Verify UI text switches to Arabic
Verify application layout renders properly in RTL format
Switch language to English and French respectively
Verify UI text switches correctly and layout resets to LTR

title: Document upload validation and secure storage
description: Verify uploaded documents conform to supported formats, are scanned for validity, securely stored in Supabase, and linked properly with no data leakage.

steps.description: Attempt to upload valid document formats (e.g. PDF, JPG)
Verify upload is successful and document is accessible securely
Attempt to upload unsupported or corrupted file formats
Verify upload is rejected with appropriate error
Verify no unauthorized access to stored documents occurs

title: Frontend-backend integration and API security
description: Verify API endpoints enforce authentication, input sanitization, return standardized success/error responses, and prevent unauthorized data access.

steps.description: Send valid authenticated requests to various API endpoints
Verify correct data is returned with status code 200
Send requests with invalid or malicious input
Verify input is sanitized and errors are handled gracefully
Send requests without authentication or with invalid tokens
Verify access is denied with appropriate error message and status code 401 or 403

title: Cross-platform synchronization and offline support
description: Verify that data changes made on one client platform (desktop, web, mobile) synchronize correctly across others including when networks go offline and later reconnect.

steps.description: Make data changes (e.g., client edit, new cession) on desktop client
Verify changes appear on web and mobile clients after sync
Perform edits on mobile client while offline
Verify edits are queued and stored locally
Reconnect mobile client to network
Verify edits are synchronized with backend and visible on other clients

title: UI responsiveness and loading state handling
description: Verify UI elements respond properly to different screen sizes on desktop, web, and mobile and that loading and error states are indicated well to the user.

steps.description: Access various pages on desktop, web, and mobile devices with different resolutions
Verify layout adjusts appropriately without content cutoff or overlap
Trigger data loading processes (e.g., fetching client list)
Verify loading indicators appear during data loading
Simulate API errors during loading
Verify error messages are displayed and UI recovers gracefully

title: Data encryption and input validation security testing
description: Verify that sensitive data sent and stored is encrypted, input fields are validated to prevent injection attacks, and that security protections (CSRF, XSS) are effective.

steps.description: Inspect network communication to verify encryption in transit (e.g., HTTPS, JWT)
Attempt common injection attacks in form inputs (SQL injection, XSS scripts)
Verify inputs are sanitized and attacks are blocked or neutralized
Validate CSRF tokens are required and enforced for state-changing requests

title: Performance under load with large datasets
description: Verify system responsiveness and query performance when dealing with large volumes of clients, payments, and inventory data.

steps.description: Populate database with large datasets for clients, payments, and inventory
Perform searches, filtering, and loading lists in client management and inventory
Verify queries complete within acceptable time limits without UI freezing
Upload large documents and observe upload performance
Verify no timeouts or performance degradations occur

title: File upload and download via Supabase integration
description: Verify files upload to and download from Supabase storage correctly without errors and with acceptable performance.

steps.description: Upload various supported file types via client UI
Verify files appear in Supabase storage and metadata is updated
Download uploaded files
Verify downloaded files match originals and open without corruption

title: System stability and error recovery under stress
description: Verify application remains stable under prolonged use and unexpected load conditions and recovers gracefully from errors or server issues.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent users performing various operations
Verify no crashes or significant slowdowns occur
Simulate backend server disconnection or errors
Verify UI properly handles errors and retries if applicable

title: Admin user system settings and user management
description: Verify ADMIN users can access system settings pages, manage users including changing roles, and apply configuration changes.

steps.description: Log in as ADMIN user
Navigate to system settings and user management pages
Create, edit, and delete user accounts and modify roles
Verify changes persist and reflect correctly in the system
